name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
description: A stretch to loosen up your hamstrings and lower back.
instructions: 1. Stand with feet together. 2. Hinge at your hips and reach for your toes. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Seated Forward Bend
description: A deep stretch for the hamstrings and lower back.
instructions: 1. Sit with legs extended straight. 2. Reach forward toward your toes. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
description: A yoga movement that increases flexibility in the spine.
instructions: 1. Start on hands and knees. 2. Inhale, arch your back (Cow). 3. Exhale, round your spine (Cat). 4. Repeat for 30 seconds.

name: Childs Pose
description: A resting yoga pose that stretches the back and hips.
instructions: 1. Sit back on your heels. 2. Extend arms forward and lower your chest. 3. Hold for 30 seconds.

name: Butterfly Stretch
description: A stretch to improve flexibility in the groin and inner thighs.
instructions: 1. Sit with soles of feet together. 2. Hold feet and gently press knees downward. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Quad Stretch
description: A standing stretch that targets the quadriceps.
instructions: 1. Stand tall. 2. Grab your ankle and pull it toward your glutes. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per leg.

name: Triceps Stretch
description: A stretch for the triceps and shoulders.
instructions: 1. Reach one arm overhead. 2. Bend the elbow and touch your back. 3. Use the other hand to press gently. 4. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Torso Twist Stretch
description: A stretch for the lower back and obliques.
instructions: 1. Sit cross-legged. 2. Twist your torso to one side, placing one hand on the opposite knee. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Standing Side Stretch
description: A full-body stretch that targets the obliques and shoulders.
instructions: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart. 2. Reach one arm overhead and lean to the side. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Downward Dog
description: A yoga pose that stretches the hamstrings, calves, and shoulders.
instructions: 1. Start in a high plank. 2. Lift hips toward the ceiling. 3. Keep heels pushing down and arms extended. 4. Hold for 30 seconds.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
description: A stretch to release tight hip flexors.
instructions: 1. Kneel on one knee with the other foot forward. 2. Shift weight forward to stretch the hip. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Neck Stretch
description: A gentle stretch for the neck and shoulders.
instructions: 1. Sit or stand tall. 2. Tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Chest Opener Stretch
description: A stretch to open up the chest and shoulders.
instructions: 1. Clasp hands behind your back. 2. Lift your arms slightly while opening your chest. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds.

name: Figure-Four Stretch
description: A deep glute and hip stretch.
instructions: 1. Lie on your back and cross one ankle over the opposite knee. 2. Pull the supporting leg toward your chest. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Seated Spinal Twist
description: A stretch to improve spinal mobility.
instructions: 1. Sit with one leg straight and the other crossed over. 2. Twist your torso toward the bent knee. 3. Hold for 20-30 seconds per side.

name: Hip Abduction Machine
description: Strengthens the muscles on the outside of your hips

name: Hip Abbduction Machine
description: Strengthens the muscles used to move your legs away from your body
